- Order medicines online - save time & effort

Want to buy medicines for the viral season? Save your time & energy of visiting the pharmacy near you. Order medicines through online pharmacies across India with the Healthmug app.

Buy medicines online in India from 60,000+ listed products that are 100% genuine & from a wide range of trusted manufacturers & providers.

We offer the Largest Range of Homeopathic, Ayurvedic, Unani & Siddha at Best Prices. Get Complete range of Ayush products on one portal with Best in Market Deals.

- Order Healthcare/OTC Products
Keeping in mind the customer requirements, the app offers multiple brands across categories to facilitate the purchase of favourites. Buy from a basket of brands like Himalaya, Hamdard, Baidyanath, Dabur, Sri Sri and many more. All items that we sell are authentic and genuine. - Sit back and relax:
